branchCategory.name: IS10E Pressure Switch with Female Pipe Adapter, AC/DC, Analog Indicator
branchCategory.description: <p>ISE10E is a pressure switch with a linear mechanical set point indicator, for modular installation with SMC's FRL units.  The switch housing attaches to a threaded block for mounting inline with the FRL.  The housing assembly includes a reed switch activated by a piston-mounted magnet.  A screw adjusts the spring loading the piston to the switch point.  Two pressure ranges are available, along with MPa and psi units on the setting scale.  The adapter block has 5 port sizes, in Rc, NPT or G thread to mount to 3 FRL body sizes.  IS10E is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: IS10E Pressure Switch with Female Pipe Adapter, AC/DC, Analog Indicator
